channel.title: Sedition || The RSPS Revolution||Custum Elite Slayer||Flawless ECO
channel.description:
[CENTER]Thread currently under massive construction. Stay tuned.
[size=18pt][b]We are new.[/b][/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nrzgJIf.png[/img]
___________________________________________
[URL=http://"http://sedition317.com/forums"]Forums[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://sedition317.com/forums/vote"]Vote[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://sedition317.com/forums/play/play.html"]Webclient[/URL] ___________________________________________
Welcome to the Official Sedition advertisement thread, we are currently in a BETA Phase. With that being said we will be striving to eliminate all bugs and glitches. We are going to be using our best resource to locate these as well, you, the player. We expect to be in this phase for the next two to three months. Accounts will not be reset during this phase unless a major game breaking bug or glitch is abused causing the server to fall short as a whole.
Anyways onto what we are about. Me and Walid set out with creating this server to be the best server is the point of view of the player. We've spent time playing the game as you would see it and have done to perfect any aspect we thought fit. We are dedicated to providing the player with the most enjoyable and consistent experience. To do this we have added a custom slayer system, although training is slow, the benefits could not be better. We custom set every single drop rate, shop item, and item cost, to coexist in the creation of what we have deemed a flawless economy. Although we will not know until the economy is established by the players, and fixes will be applied as needed. We've also implemented a system to those that just aren't lucky, by killing bosses you will gain a PvM point, this point can then be spent in the store at home; the rewards won't be anything close to getting a drop though.
___________________________________________
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iBAg41x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hJubGf6.png[/img]
- All Spells Working. - All Working Spell Books. - Working Armadyl Spell. - Working Polypore staff.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/btP6jmU.png[/img]
- Every Prayer Working. - Every Bone Working on Altar. - Working Super Prayer. - Coming Soon... Quick Prayers.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EGl3Ewd.png[/img]
- Zaryte Bow - Handcannon w/ Special. - All Bolt Effects. - All Ammo.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4nl3fCP.png[/img]
- All Altars Working. - All Pouches Working. - It's just Runecrafting. ;]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/faPdtZD.png[/img]
- Working Implings. - Working Butterflys. - More Coming Soon...
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6sJAsAA.png[/img]
- Working Gnome Course. - Working Barb Couse. - Working Wilderness Course. - Coming Soon... Custom Elite Course.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0YtiSTk.png[/img]
- All Normal Potions. - All Extreme Potions. - Working Overloads. - Flasks.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nn3rLzS.png[/img] - Ardougne Area - All Stalls - Multiple Pickpocket NPCs
Fully working Summoning Fully working Farming Fully working Fishing
Crystal Key Chest Mystery Box with rare item annoucement
Pest Control Weapon Game Duel arena
All Gods Nex Corp Gano Beast Glacors Vyre Watch Revenants ....
All Godswords Armadyl staff , Spell Polypore staff Working Zaryte Bow Korasi Dragon Claws Chaotics PvP Armours PvP Weapons All Spirit Shields Kiln Cape All Nex armour
Slayer Points System Elite Slayer Task Pvm Point system PvP Points System
Custom shop Interface Custom monster tele Interface
And so much more!
[SIZE=3]Staff List[/SIZE] _________
Main Owners: Walid , Krome
[SIZE=3]Pictures[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AmlUVtB.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8zks4dR.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xaVdP24.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g0lhsu6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fX6OxF0.png[/img] [/center] _________
